# activationMode

**Instance Property**

The mode in which to run the app when the action is performed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activationMode: UIUserNotificationActivationMode { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value in this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUserNotificationActivationMode/foreground], the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUserNotificationAction/isAuthenticationRequired] property is assumed to be [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] regardless of its actual value.

## Getting the action’s configuration

- **isAuthenticationRequired**: A Boolean value indicating whether the user must unlock the device before the action is performed.
- **isDestructive**: A Boolean value indicating whether the action is destructive.
- **behavior**: The custom behavior (if any) that the action supports.
- **parameters**: A dictionary of additional parameters to include with the action.
